mutants.code:
import re
import string

def remove_vowels_digits_punctuation_whitespace(text):
    """"""
    text = re.sub('[^A-Za-z\\s]', '', text)
    text = text.translate(str.maketrans('', '', string.punctuation))
    text = text.translate(str.maketrans('', '', string.whitespace))
    vowels = {'a', 'e', 'i', 'o', 'u', 'A', 'E', 'I', 'O', 'U'}
    result = ''.join([char for char in text if char not in vowels])
    return result

import re
import string

def remove_vowels_digits_punctuation_whitespace(text):
    """
    Remove vowels, digits, punctuation marks, whitespace characters, and non-English alphabetical characters.
    Returns a string of only consonant non-punctuation non-whitespace English alphabet characters.
    """
    text = re.sub('', '', text)
    text = text.translate(str.maketrans('', '', string.punctuation))
    text = text.translate(str.maketrans('', '', string.whitespace))
    vowels = {'a', 'e', 'i', 'o', 'u', 'A', 'E', 'I', 'O', 'U'}
    result = ''.join([char for char in text if char not in vowels])
    return result

import re
import string

def remove_vowels_digits_punctuation_whitespace(text):
    """
    Remove vowels, digits, punctuation marks, whitespace characters, and non-English alphabetical characters.
    Returns a string of only consonant non-punctuation non-whitespace English alphabet characters.
    """
    text = re.sub('[^A-Za-z\\s]', 'MUTATED', text)
    text = text.translate(str.maketrans('', '', string.punctuation))
    text = text.translate(str.maketrans('', '', string.whitespace))
    vowels = {'a', 'e', 'i', 'o', 'u', 'A', 'E', 'I', 'O', 'U'}
    result = ''.join([char for char in text if char not in vowels])
    return result

import re
import string

def remove_vowels_digits_punctuation_whitespace(text):
    """
    Remove vowels, digits, punctuation marks, whitespace characters, and non-English alphabetical characters.
    Returns a string of only consonant non-punctuation non-whitespace English alphabet characters.

    text = re.sub('[^A-Za-z\\s]', '', text)
    text = text.translate(str.maketrans('MUTATED', '', string.punctuation))
    text = text.translate(str.maketrans('', '', string.whitespace))
    vowels = {'a', 'e', 'i', 'o', 'u', 'A', 'E', 'I', 'O', 'U'}
    result = ''.join([char for char in text if char not in vowels])
    return result

import re
import string

def remove_vowels_digits_punctuation_whitespace(text):
    """
    Remove vowels, digits, punctuation marks, whitespace characters, and non-English alphabetical characters.
    Returns a string of only consonant non-punctuation non-whitespace English alphabet characters.

    text = text.translate(str.maketrans('', 'MUTATED', string.punctuation))
    text = text.translate(str.maketrans('', '', string.whitespace))

    result = ''.join([char for char in text if char not in vowels])
    return result

def remove_vowels_digits_punctuation_whitespace(text):
    """
    Remove vowels, digits, punctuation marks, whitespace characters, and non-English alphabetical characters.
    Returns a string of only consonant non-punctuation non-whitespace English alphabet characters.

import re
import string

def remove_vowels_digits_punctuation_whitespace(text):
    """
    Remove vowels, digits, punctuation marks, whitespace characters, and non-English alphabetical characters.
    Returns a string of only consonant non-punctuation non-whitespace English alphabet characters.
    """
    text = re.sub('[^A-Za-z\\s]', '', text)
    text = text.translate(str.maketrans('', '', string.punctuation))
    text = text.translate(str.maketrans('', '', string.whitespace))
    vowels = {'a', 'e', 'i', 'o', 'u', 'A', 'E', 'I', 'O', 'U'}
    result = 'MUTATED'.join([char for char in text if char not in vowels])
    return result

import re
import string

def remove_vowels_digits_punctuation_whitespace(text):
    """
    Remove vowels, digits, punctuation marks, whitespace characters, and non-English alphabetical characters.
    Returns a string of only consonant non-punctuation non-whitespace English alphabet characters.
    """
    text = re.sub('[^A-Za-z\\s]', '', text)
    text = text.translate(str.maketrans('', '', string.punctuation))
    text = text.translate(str.maketrans('', '', string.whitespace))
    vowels = {'a', 'e', 'i', 'o', 'u', 'A', 'E', 'I', 'O', 'U'}
    result = ''.join([char for char in text if char in vowels])
    return result
